page.title: 09HOME LIFE: WHITEBEAMS.
page.content: The owners, both in their mid- forties and retired, live in this spacious house on the outskirts of {Rookley.}Mr. was a former{management {consultant}for{Cable and Wireless}and Mrs. was a former teacher. The husband grows apples for a hobby with some help from his wife. He has a lot of apple trees ranging from {Winstons}to{Sunsets. There is plenty of wildlife in the orchard but the most common animal is the rabbit. They have 2 children both left school,a dog called Henry, and they have 2 goldfish in the pond. Also outside and beside the swimming pool there is a{glass dome}made out of triangular windows where the owners sunbathe. There are often friends and relatives down to stay who enjoy the view from the split level house with its large windows.
